speaker: Veronica
title: Use Bing AI to tap into the world of knowledge
description: Bing APIs provide the pre-built AI capabilities to your business to build diverse search scenarios at web-scale. With the Bing Web Search API, you can get the most relevant, contextual, and up-to-date results for your queries, which include webpages, images, videos, news, popular entities, and other answers. With the vertical search APIs, you can obtain enriched metadata, use advanced filtering capabilities, and leverage suite of capabilities around images, videos, and news to build compelling user experiences.
